content.text:
Let me analyze the structure and block dictionary to provide the assembly instructions:

Structure Analysis:
- Total blocks: 8
- Layers: 3 main layers
- Colors used: Red, Yellow, Blue, Orange
- Unique spatial arrangement with columns, arch, and platform elements

Required Blocks (by index):
1. Block 1 (Red arch)
2. Block 2 (Red block/column segment)
3. Block 3 (Red column segment)
4. Block 4 (Blue cube)
5. Block 8 (Yellow rectangular block)
6. Block 9 (Yellow vertical block)
7. Block 10 (Orange cylinder)
8. Block 11 (Orange cylinder)
9. Block 12 (Red triangular block)
10. Block 13 (Orange cube)

Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 10 (Orange cylinder)
    Step2: Move block with index 11 (Orange cylinder)
    Step3: Move block with index 9 (Yellow vertical block)
    Step4: Move block with index 8 (Yellow rectangular block)
    Step5: Move block with index 4 (Blue cube)
    Step6: Move block with index 13 (Orange cube)
    Step7: Move block with index 2 (Red block/column segment)
    Step8: Move block with index 3 (Red column segment)
    Step9: Move block with index 1 (Red arch)
    Step10: Move block with index 12 (Red triangular block)
}
